title: Brazil Labour Costs
description: Labour Costs in Brazil increased to 104.51 points in September from 98.48 points in August of 2022. Labour Costs in Brazil averaged 109.81 points from 1988 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 181.87 points in July of 2011 and a record low of 39.60 points in October of 2002. This page provides - Brazil Labour Costs - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Banco Central Do Brasil
